fields_of_interest: Education and training, Digital economy and society

eu_initiatives: Lingvist follows the Data Protection Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Lingvist aims to become the globally known leader in language learning. Our mission is to fundamentally transform the way people learn languages through clever, adaptive technology which makes learning, faster, more accessible and more efficient. Lingvist is an innovative language learning platform designed to help users learn quickly and effectively by tailoring training to their needs. The platform uses statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms to make language learning faster and more efficient. Its adaptive algorithm filters out anything a user doesn’t need or already knows, determining precise learning needs and customising educational material according to what they need to know. The platform has enabled over 500,000 people around the world to learn faster.
